channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Solution Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Solution Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-21483|2024-08-03T18:16:22.566Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20solution%20manager
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Solution Manager, version - 720, allows a high privileged attacker to get access to sensitive information which has a direct serious impact beyond the exploitable component thereby affecting the confidentiality in the application.
